name: My Only Sunshine (KateTheDragon)
description:
There are many eggs, but only one of them is Mama's baby. Figure out which egg you're controlling, and reunite it with its mother.

UPDATE:  included a .zip of the data files. The original .exe is still there, a copy is also included in the .zip. It should be identical but you don't have to take my word for it!

Game by Kate Peterson of Dragonoid Studios

Music by Erik Peterson
